name: openvpn
description: OpenVPN is an open-source VPN protocol and software suite that enables secure point-to-point and site-to-site connections. It features strong encryption, cross-platform support, and can be deployed on self-hosted servers.
features: Secure tunneling: Encrypt all network traffic between clients and servers using AES-256 and other strong ciphers.
Cross-platform clients: Connect from Windows, macOS, Linux, iOS, and Android devices with official client applications.
Certificate authentication: Use PKI with client certificates for strong authentication without password vulnerabilities.
Site-to-site VPN: Connect entire networks securely for branch office connectivity or cloud integration.
Split tunneling: Route only specific traffic through the VPN while allowing direct internet access for other connections.
Dynamic IP support: Maintain VPN connections even when client IP addresses change on mobile or residential networks.
Compression: Reduce bandwidth usage with LZO compression for faster performance on limited connections.
Logging and monitoring: Track connection events, bandwidth usage, and authentication attempts for security auditing.
